mapper.select: select user_no,user_Id,user_name from member where pt = #{userId} and status = 'Y'
select b.user_name ,b.user_Id from member a join member b on (a.pt = b.user_id) where a.user_id =#{userId} and b.status = 'Y'

SELECT m1.user_name AS send_id, m2.user_name AS get_id, mealplan.get_id, mealplan.send_id, mealplan.food_code, mealplan.food_name, mealplan.carbs, mealplan.fat, mealplan.protein, mealplan.kcal, mealplan.sugar, mealplan.meal_date, mealplan.meal_msg, mealplan.meal_remsg FROM mealplan JOIN member m1 ON mealplan.send_id = m1.user_id JOIN member m2 ON mealplan.get_id = m2.user_id where get_id = #{getUserId} and send_id = #{sendUserId} and meal_date = #{mealDate} and msg_type = 'T'
